songs.title: Gold Trans Am
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
This song makes me wanna have sex in my car, uh

[Refrain]
Wham, bam!
Thank you, man
Get inside my fucking gold Trans Am
Wham, bam!
Thank you, man
Get inside my fucking gold Trans Am

[Verse 1]
Pull over, sucker
Now spread 'em
Lemme see what you're packing inside that denim
Pedal to the metal
Looking straight amazing
I can’t help all the hell that I’m raising (Sorry!)
Stopping traffic like an ambulance
Tryna get my hands in your worn down pants

[Pre-Chorus]
Heya, Skynyrd t-shirt tight
Baby, need a ride?
I’m the captain of this ship, so shut up and get inside (get inside)

[Chorus]
C'mon, climb into my golden cockpit
Love you 'til you're seeing stars and stripes
Burning rubber on the southern highway
Gonna take you for a freedom ride
Get inside!

[Refrain]
Wham, bam!
Thank you, man
Get inside my fucking gold Trans Am
Wham, bam!
Thank you, man
Get inside my fucking gold Trans Am

[Verse 2]
Your sweet-ass mullet caught my eye
Now you got me jonesing for a mustache ride
Twenty bucks and a switchblade knife
American metal with a devil inside
Daisy dukes showing off my ass
And when I walk past give the boys whiplash

[Pre-Chorus]
Heya, Skynyrd t-shirt tight
Baby, need a ride? (Yeah, you do)
I’m the captain of this ship, so shut up and get inside (Get inside)

[Chorus]
C'mon, climb into my golden cockpit (c'mon)
Love you 'til you're seeing stars and stripes
Burning rubber on the southern highway
Gonna take you for a freedom ride
Get inside! (do it get inside, get inside)

[Breakdown]
Freedom ride!
Get inside!

[Chorus]
C'mon, climb into my golden cockpit
Love you 'til you're seeing stars and stripes
Burning rubber on the southern highway (southern highway)
Gonna take you for a freedom ride
Get inside!
